Html:
Hello everyone!

I am new to the area of "studying and using someonelse's libraries", so I got this question:
I downloaded the library QrCode.Net and looked through it.
My task is to generate a QR code image exactly like the one from the picture on the homepage of the library.
I am not really sure how to use the QrCodeGraphicControl (because I suppose that's where I should start from).
So yeah... any suggestion ?

https://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=GraphicsRenderer&referringTitle=Renderer

Documentation and example here. This is for winform.
